task: Develop a basic 'Fire Emblem' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Do the words need changing?'.
name: Ember Legacy

branding_data.short_description: A tactical RPG where words hold power and battles are won with strategy and dialogue.
branding_data.detailed_description: Ember Legacy is a tactical role-playing game inspired by the classic 'Fire Emblem' series, where players lead a group of heroes through strategic grid-based battles. However, in this unique twist, the power of words plays a crucial role. Each character's dialogue can influence the outcome of battles, sway enemies, and unlock new paths. Players must carefully choose their words to inspire allies and demoralize foes, making every conversation as critical as the battles themselves. With a rich story steeped in lore and a dynamic cast of characters, Ember Legacy challenges players to think strategically both in combat and in conversation.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
